<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Ant](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=362)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 21 <sup>1.1</sup>

Ants are industrious insects that aid the natural processes of decay and renewal.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Army Ant Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2825) (Creature 5), [Giant Ant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2824) (Creature 2)
name: Ant
